author: jameshe5018
content: this was a request we got from a user https://github.com/prysmaticlabs/prysm/issues/14593, wondering what you guys think of adding to beacon API spec adding the Accept-Encoding: gzip or similar

author: jgm
content: I don't think that should be part of the spec.  API servers can implement compression or not, that's up to them.
